languages.text: Наковальня, покрытая письменами и символами Хаоса, предназначена для работы одного человека — мастера по выковке колдовских деталей, используемых в сложных машинах.
The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.
languages.original_text: Наковальня, покрытая письменами и символами Хаоса, предназначена для работы одного человека — мастера по выковке колдовских деталей, используемых в сложных машинах.

traits.locale_text: The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.
The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.
The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.

languages.text: El yunque, cubierto de inscripciones y símbolos del Caos, está diseñado para que lo utilice una sola persona: un maestro de forja capaz de crear los componentes de hechicería que se usan en las máquinas más complejas.
languages.original_text: The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.

traits.locale_text: El yunque, cubierto de inscripciones y símbolos del Caos, está diseñado para que lo utilice una sola persona: un maestro de forja capaz de crear los componentes de hechicería que se usan en las máquinas más complejas.

languages.text: 这个铁砧上刻满了混沌的铭文与符号，是为某个人特别设计的。这位铸造大师应该能通过复杂的机器，制造出带有巫术力量的部件。
languages.original_text: The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.

traits.locale_text: 这个铁砧上刻满了混沌的铭文与符号，是位某个人特别设计的。这位铸造大师应该能通过复杂的机器，制造出带有巫术力量的部件。

languages.text: 混沌の碑文とシンボルに覆われた金床は、一人の職人のためにデザインされている…その職人は、複雑な機械で使われる魔術部品を作ることのできるフォージ マスターだ。
languages.original_text: The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.

traits.locale_text: 混沌の碑文とシンボルに覆われた金床は、一人の職人のためにデザインされている…その職人は、複雑な機械で使われる魔術部品を作ることのできるフォージ マスターだ。

languages.text: L'enclume, couverte d'inscriptions et de symboles du Chaos, est réservée à l'usage d'une seule personne : un maître de forge capable de façonner des composants occultes pour des machineries complexes.
languages.original_text: The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.

traits.locale_text: L'enclume, couverte d'inscriptions et de symboles du Chaos, est réservée à l'usage d'une seule personne : un maître de forge capable de façonner des composants occultes pour des machineries complexes.

languages.text: Der Amboss ist mit Inschriften und Symbolen des Chaos bedeckt und dient exakt einer Person als Arbeitsgerät – einem Schmiedemeister, der darauf magische Komponenten für komplexe Maschinen herstellt.
languages.original_text: The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.

traits.locale_text: Der Amboss ist mit Inschriften und Symbolen des Chaos bedeckt und dient exakt einer Person als Arbeitsgerät – einem Schmiedemeister, der darauf magische Komponenten für komplexe Maschinen herstellt.

languages.text: Kaos'un yazıt ve sembolleriyle kaplı örs, tek bir kişinin çalışması için tasarlanmış: Karmaşık makinelerde kullanılan sihirli bileşenleri imal edebilen bir ocak üstadı için.
languages.original_text: The anvil, covered with the inscriptions and symbols of Chaos, is designed for the work of one person — a forge master who is capable of creating sorcerous components used in complex machines.
